title: Camille is disgusting.
body:
So overloaded and broken lmao.

Her dash alone is basically like a malphite ult on a normal ability, how is this fine? Time to permaban this champion until nerfs.

replies.body: My 1st game with her I went 2-11. My 1st game with Yasuo and Illaio, I got two quadras.

> [{quoted}](name=RexSaur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQ10iX1e,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-13T11:57:07.849+0000)
>
> So overloaded and broken lmao.
> 
> Her dash alone is basically like a malphite ult on a normal ability, how is this fine? Time to permaban this champion until nerfs.

that's what she said.
just got out of a game with a tank camille who also had over 300 ad could 1v1 anyone, when low on hp just spammed her hooks and dashed away rito pls delete this champion
I can tell you the counter I have in mind. Morg...will straight dumpster her. Mark my words.
